thumb.title: Aliens vs. Predator 2 - COOPERATIVE MOD | FULL MARINE CAMPAIGN | AVPUNKNOWN
thumb.description: it’s been forever since we finished the full Marine campaign in Aliens vs. Predator 2. We’re rusty, we’ve forgotten a bunch of stuff… but we figured, why not jump back in? This time we’re playing it with friends, @b1kingkenny The AVP2 Co-Op Mod (link’s in the video description if you wanna try it). So grab a drink, get some snacks, and hang out with us for an hour of pure chaos aliens, predators, and plenty of fails along the way. This is Aliens vs. Predator 2 Co-Op and it’s EPIC! DOWNLOAD FROM MODDB OR AVPUNKNOWN MODDB DOWNLOAD https://www.moddb.com/mods/avp2-cooperative AVPUNKNOWN COOP SITE https://avpunknown.com/avp2coop
